name: How was your day? (ytraboz, quasimolo, Émeric Coudé)
name_original: How was your day? (ytraboz, quasimolo, Émeric Coudé)
description:
Made in a week for the IVGD Summer FrogJam 2022.
The theme of the jam was : Liminality!


Have a great day!

Keyboard + Mouse

WASD or Arrows : Move Character

Left or Right Ctrl : Crouch

Left or Right Shift: Jog

Escape : Pause

Left-Click Mouse : Interact
